evidence.text: 1. Grants Pass Municipal Code (GPMC) 6.46.355 fails to provide individuals excluded from Grants Pass parks with adequate procedural due process;

extracted.value: Grants Pass Municipal Code (GPMC) 6.46.355 fails to provide individuals excluded from Grants Pass parks with adequate procedural due process

evidence.text:
2.   As detailed in the Court’s Order and Opinion, defendants’ enforcement of GPMC 
5.61.020, 5.61.030, and 6.46.090 violates the Eighth Amendment prohibition against cruel and unusual punishment;

extracted.value: Enforcement of GPMC 5.61.020, 5.61.030, and 6.46.090 violates Eighth Amendment prohibition against cruel and unusual punishment

evidence.text:
3.   As detailed in the Court’s Order and Opinion, defendants’ enforcement of GPMC 
5.61.020, 5.61.030, and 6.46.090 violates the Eighth Amendment prohibition against excessive fines;

extracted.value: Enforcement of GPMC 5.61.020, 5.61.030, and 6.46.090 violates Eighth Amendment prohibition against excessive fines

evidence.text:
a. Defendant is enjoined from enforcing GPMC 6.46.350 (the park exclusion 
ordinance);

extracted.value: Enjoin enforcement of GPMC 6.46.350 (park exclusion ordinance)
Enjoin enforcement of GPMC 5.61.030 and GPMC 6.46.090 without 24-hour warning

evidence.text:
c. Defendant is enjoined from enforcing GPMC 5.61.030, GPMC 6.46.090 (the 
camping ordinances) and GPMC 5.57.020(A) (criminal trespassing on city property related to 
parks) from 9:00 p.m. to 7:30 a.m. during the months of April through September and from 
7:00 p.m. to 7:30 a.m. during the months of October to March, in all City parks with the 
exception of Reinhart Volunteer Park located at 1690 SW Webster Rd.

extracted.value: Enjoin enforcement of GPMC 5.61.030, GPMC 6.46.090, and GPMC 5.57.020(A) during restricted hours in parks (except Reinhart Volunteer Park)

evidence.text:
5.   Plaintiffs are entitled to reasonable attorney fees and costs to be determined under 
FRCP 54(d).

extracted.value: Plaintiffs entitled to reasonable attorney fees and costs under FRCP 54(d)
